content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: CORE
      operator: equal_to
      value: Exp
    - name: GEN
      operator: not_exists
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0016
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when Variable Core Status = Expected and Variable does
  not exist.
Outcome:
  Message: SDTM Expected variable not found in the dataset.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0016
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: "When the study does not include the data item for\
                  \ an expected variable, however, a null column must still be included\
                  \ in the dataset,\n and a comment must be included in the Define-XML\
                  \ document to state that the study does not include the data item."
                Document: SDTM v1.4
                Section: 4.1.5
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when Variable Core Status = Expected and Variable does not exist.

Outcome.Message: SDTM Expected variable not found in the dataset.

Citations.Cited_Guidance:
When the study does not include the data item for an expected variable, however, a null column must still be included in the dataset,
 and a comment must be included in the Define-XML document to state that the study does not include the data item.
